name: The Tofu Maker in Salatiga
description:
Besides being famous as the number two city of tolerance in Indonesia, Salatiga City is also famous as one of the centers for tofu producers,
Precisely in the Kalitaman village area, Tingkir District, Salatiga City, Central Java, Indonesia. Several tofu industries in this area have been established since the 1960s.
And it is an inherited business from generation to generation.
Almost the entire tofu industry in this region still uses traditional tools to produce tofu.

The basic thing that is often a problem for the tofu industry in this region is the difficulty of finding a suitable tofu maker.
This is because many employees have stopped working due to age and the declining interest of young people in the surrounding area to become tofu makers. As a result, the makers of tofu there are mostly people with a fairly advanced age.
And this affects the amount of tofu production.
